description.value: When a hell hound combusts, some of its shaggy dark hair may remain. Alchemists and magic users can use the hair for it's arcane properties and ties to other planes. Use: As an action, a creature may burn a handful of hell hound hair. For the next minute, whenever that creature rolls a 1 or 2 on a fire damage dice roll, the creature may reroll that die and must use the new number.
